channel.title: Podcasts, roundtables and discussions on Security engineering by vixentael
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts, roundtables and discussions on Security engineering by vixentael

item.title: OWASP Zhytomyr meetup: SSDLC and product security
item.description: OWASP Zhytomyr meetup “Security on your project from scratch”: risks analysis, building SSLDC, working with the development team and checklists.

item.title: iOS App Security, Live! ðŸŽ™ with Anastasiia Voitova
item.description: A live episode with live Q&A of iOS App Security by Vincent Pradeilles and Anastasiia Voitova.

item.title: AppForce1: news and info for iOS app developers
item.description: Semi-fun semi-serious podcast episode where Jeroen Leenarts asks me questions about life, education, programming, and security.

item.title: NewPodcast2, ep. 27: vixentael and security
item.description: Russian-speaking podcast about software engineering lead by engineers all over the world.

item.title: Mobile app security roundtable with Anastasiia Voitova, Julia Potapenko and Julia Vashchenko
item.description: We had a lot of fun discussing the latest mobile app security topics from the eyes of people that build secure apps and help others to build secure apps: iOS14 privacy features, security.

item.title: Crypto AMA with Anastasiia Voitova, Ruslan Kiyanchuk and Mark Carney
item.description: We’re speaking about cryptography and explain why base64 is our favourite cipher!
